pages.text: Your alignment is affected by your actions:$(br2)You gain $(#00a8a8)purity$() by$(li) Killing Illagers.$(li) Healing Pets.$(li) Bonemealing Plants.$(br2)You gain $(#00a8a8)corruption$() by$(li) Killing Villagers.$(li) Hurting babies.$(li) Hurting pets.

Each path can grant you perks, but be aware that if you choose a path of corruption, you are likely to $(d)lose your mind$().$(br2)Having positive alignment, conversely, can $(#00a800)soothe you and help your mental health$(). Only you can decide what to prioritize.

pages.title: Knowledge of Death
pages.text: Access this screen by pressing Y.

You can check your $(#00a8a8)Alignment$(), as well as choose perks and view your powers, by accessing your $(#00a8a8)Knowledge of Death.$() You can earn more knowledge by $(6)dying or killing undead$(), and as you gain levels, you obtain points which can unlock special abilities.
